stories.text: During a trip to Rome, Italy in 2021, I met a man who told me I needed to create an API. After returning to the states, I enrolled in a coding bootcamp with one sole mission: learn to create an API. During bootcamp I created my first few projects including Password Generator and Budget Breaker

After completing the 6 month program, I became a terrible fake it until you make it full stack developer. But we all start somewhere right? So connecting to a free API, i created my first solo project: Love compatibility.
Shortly after, I recognized a new world of development - VR Development. I began to teach myself a new VR HTML language named A-frame and deployed my first enviornment.

Now I noticed the value in purchasing domain names. I now own more than 30. But the first one I bought was my own name (after a political smear campaign story I was told) - here is my very first portfolio prior to this one. This was also my first React portfolio.
Here is the part in my journey where digital art began. Creating custom domains and images, I began creating digital art porfolios.
This is where I began to solidify myself in React and Typescript and focused my growing efforts on these frameworks.
Now I know what you're thinking - at what point do you get good?! WELL...here we go. One day I woke up and things began to click within React and design.

This brings us to 2025, modern day. After creating a digital agency at the beginning of the year, I decided to rededicate my time to myself and my portfolio. I will continue to push out more projects, more github commits, and am currently learning Python. I will include a python project soon.
